dt: {bc}serving or intended to guide, govern, or influence

{bc}of or relating to {d_link|psychotherapy|psychotherapy} or {d_link|counseling|counseling} in which the counselor introduces information, content, or attitudes not previously expressed by the client

shortdef: serving or intended to guide, govern, or influence
serving to point direction; specifically : directional
of or relating to psychotherapy or counseling in which the counselor introduces information, content, or attitudes not previously expressed by the client

dt: {bc}something that serves to {a_link|direct}, guide, and usually {d_link|impel|impel} toward an action or goal
{bc}an authoritative order or instrument issued by a high-level body or official

shortdef: something that serves to direct, guide, and usually impel toward an action or goal; especially, government : an authoritative order or instrument issued by a high-level body or official

dt: {bc}a legal document (such as a living will) signed by a competent person to provide guidance for medical and health-care decisions (such as the termination of life support or organ donation) in the event the person becomes incompetent to make such decisions

shortdef: a legal document (such as a living will) signed by a competent person to provide guidance for medical and health-care decisions (such as the termination of life support or organ donation) in the event the person becomes incompetent to make such decisions

dt: {bc}a document that notifies the owners or operators of a particular model of aircraft that unsafe or potentially unsafe conditions have been discovered which may affect the airworthiness of the model in question and that details any corrective actions which may be necessary to address the deficiency

shortdef: a document that notifies the owners or operators of a particular model of aircraft that unsafe or potentially unsafe conditions have been discovered which may affect the airworthiness of the model in question and that details any corrective actions which may be necessary to address the deficiency

dt.t: The core aspect of the definition of {ldquo}play{rdquo} is that it's {wi}self-directive{/wi}. You're deciding what you're going to do with whatever you're interacting with.
My mom was very much about being {wi}self-directive{/wi} as a woman and not finding your identity in who you were with.
